name: find_react_hooks_implementation
description: Search for React hooks implementation patterns in a popular library
prompt: Find how useState is implemented in the React repository. Show me the core logic.

name: locate_config_files
description: Find configuration files in a monorepo
prompt: Find all tsconfig.json files in the vercel/next.js repository and show their structure.

name: find_function_definition
description: Locate a specific function definition using LSP
prompt: Find the definition of the 'createServer' function in the local codebase.

name: npm_package_lookup
description: Search for npm package information
prompt: Find information about the 'zod' npm package including its repository URL.

name: find_pr_that_added_feature
description: Find the pull request that introduced a specific feature
prompt: Find the PR that added Server Actions to Next.js

name: search_nonexistent_repo
description: Handle error when searching a non-existent repository
prompt: Search for code in the repository 'nonexistent-owner/nonexistent-repo-12345'

name: find_test_patterns
description: Search for testing patterns in a codebase
prompt: Find examples of how tests are structured in the facebook/react repository. Show me describe blocks and test patterns.

name: local_file_content
description: Read local file content with specific patterns
prompt: Show me the contents of the package.json file in the current directory.

name: find_all_references
description: Find all usages of a symbol
prompt: Find all references to the 'EvalScorer' type in the codebase.

name: python_package_search
description: Search for Python package information
prompt: Find the repository URL for the 'requests' Python package.

name: find_api_endpoints
description: Search for API endpoint definitions
prompt: Find all API route handlers in the Next.js examples repository

name: find_call_hierarchy
description: Analyze function call hierarchy
prompt: Show me what functions call 'runSingleEval' and what functions it calls.

name: repo_structure_exploration
description: Explore repository structure
prompt: Show me the directory structure of the microsoft/typescript repository, focusing on the src folder.

name: find_error_handling_patterns
description: Search for error handling patterns
prompt: Find examples of try-catch error handling in the octocode-mcp codebase

name: find_merged_prs
description: Search for merged pull requests with specific criteria
prompt: Find merged PRs in the vercel/next.js repo that mention 'performance' in the last month

name: invalid_local_path
description: Handle error when accessing invalid local path
prompt: Read the file at /nonexistent/path/that/does/not/exist.ts

name: find_type_definitions
description: Search for TypeScript type definitions
prompt: Find the type definition for 'ToolResponse' in the Octocode codebase

name: compare_implementations
description: Compare different implementations of similar functionality
prompt: Find how different MCP servers implement the 'listTools' function. Compare octocode-mcp with other MCP servers.

name: find_deprecated_code
description: Search for deprecated code patterns
prompt: Find any deprecated functions or APIs marked with @deprecated in the React repository

name: search_with_regex_pattern
description: Search using complex regex patterns
prompt: Find all export statements that export types in the local codebase
